text: Answer: 4 Solution: Hash function h{x) = (11x) mod 13 given hash table use open addressing and liner probing key to be inserted 12, 30, 42, 37, 46, 44, 82, 60,145, 59 and 28 h(12) = (11 x 12) mod 13 = 2 [0 159 | 1n(30) = (11 x30) mod 13 = 5 [T |h@2)=(11x42) mod13=7 h(37) = (11 x 37) mod 13 = 4 h(46) = (11 x 46) mod 13 = 12 h(44) = (11 x 44) mod 13 =3 h(82) = (11 x 82) mod 13 = 5 (collision) [6 82 | h(82) = (h(82) + 1) mod 13 = 6 h(60) = (11 x 60) mod 13 = 10 [ | h(145)=(11x 145) mod 13=9 [0 [ T45] h(59) = (11 x 59) mod 13 = 12 (collision) [10]60 | h(S9) = (h(59) + 1) mod 13 = 0 h(28) = (11 x 28) mod 13 = 9 (collision) h(28) = (h(28) + 1) mod 13 = 10 (collision) h(28) = (h(28) + 2) mod 13 = 11 Total number of collisions = 4 Correct answer is 4
